name: Tank Hunting Ducks
description:
Your mission, should you accept it, is to get past the beach head. Make it through the wall by breaking through the gate.

The ducks are revolting! Tired of being hunted for centuries they take up arms! These are not ordinary ducks! They drop bombs, and use missile turrets to stop you!

Use WASD to move tank. Arrow keys to move turret and gun. Space to fire. P to pause game.
